Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.29040295] Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=32 μg/ml; MBC=32 μg/ml), Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=128 μg/ml; MBC=256 μg/ml);Fungi:Candida albicans (MIC=512 μg/ml; MBC=512 μg/ml)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.29040295] 7% haemolysis at 1.56 μg/ml, 10% haemolysis at 3.13 μg/ml, 70% haemolysis at 6.25 μg/ml, 95% haemolysis at 12.50 μg/ml, 98% haemolysis at 25.00 μg/ml, 100% haemolysis at 50.00 μg/ml against mouse red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against the Gram-positive bacteria. Antifungal activity.

Literature.Title: Hydrophobic residues are critical for the helix-forming, hemolytic and bactericidal activities of amphipathic antimicrobial peptide TP4.
Literature.Author: Chang TW, Wei SY, Wang SH, Wei HM, Wang YJ, Wang CF, Chen C, Liao YD.
